history.narrative: Law 8-13 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-238. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 4, 1989 and April 18, 1989, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 27, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 8-29 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
